meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathy Kirkhofer David Poland Lois Kurowski Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1472.

td.p: Kathy Kirkhofer, an accountant & CPA from Lake Arrowhead, California
David Poland, a writer originally from Miami, Florida
Lois Kurowski, a doctoral student from Elkhart, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,800)

tr.td: WOMEN AUTHORS
FLOWERS
POTENT POTABLES
3-LETTER WORDS
MOVIES
MASCOTS

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Lois
David
Kathy
SHAKESPEAREAN 1ST LINES
[The "ST" were in upper case and a little shorter than than the "1"]
20TH CENTURY PERSONALITIES
[The "TH" were upper case and a little shorter than the "20."]
U.S. STATES
MEN OF SCIENCE
MYTHOLOGY
CARNEGIE HALL

tr.td: Lois
David
Kathy

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
DavidWhat is Stanford? [smile face drawn]
$600
KathyWhat is the Univ of Vienna?
$7,300
LoisWhat is Stanford University
$7,300
Stanford University')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Working here, Lewis Terman adapted Binet\'s test & came up with the term "intelligence quotient"')

tr.td: COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
Working here, Lewis Terman adapted Binet's test & came up with the term "intelligence quotient"
Lois
David
Kathy
2-day champion: $29,400
2nd place: Lehigh bedroom furniture & "Summer Wildflowers" lithograph + Jeopardy! home game or Jeopardy! Challenger
3rd place: Sierra Cricket on the Hearth fireplace + Jeopardy! home game or Jeopardy! Challenger
Lois
David
Kathy

17 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

12 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)
